extends java.lang.Object

      • validateFileType

        public FileTypeValidationResponse validateFileType(java.io.InputStream is,
                                                   java.lang.String fileName)
        Validate if the InputStream has a file type allowed for uploading. The file name is used for checking the matching the mime type of the stream.
